# mssqlserver_user_login (Resource)

Defines a Link between an instance level Login and a database level User



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **database** (String)
- **login** (String)
- **username** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
